Description:
This role provides a fantastic development opportunity for a dedicated and enthusiastic individual that has a knack for organisational and administrative work. The right individual for this role will need to demonstrate ability to provide a high-quality administrative service, a keen interest in managing projects, as well as considerable initiative, a strong willingness to learn on the job and a commitment to continuous improvement.Content CreationCreate content for the listed products that is fit for Fedshi’s concept and to enable resellers to engage and convert sales
Collect and analyse sales data and optimize content creation to improve traffic and conversion metrics for SKUs
Identify, train and collaborate with photographers and videographers to produce relevant content to scale content production in a frugal manner, creating relevant content for the market
Research and identify online selling trends in Iraq and regionally and introduce new content for Fedshi’s assortment and resellers community Product listingLiaise with suppliers, photographers, content creators and other stakeholders to gather content for products that will be listed on the platform
Upload products (images, videos, copy) to the platform using the back-end systems of the platform, following existing guidelines and ensuring the highest degree of quality and accuracy
Update listings of existing products with new images, videos and copy to ensure adherence to latest guidelines and the highest degree of quality and accuracy
Execute business-led commercial and operational changes to the catalogue including pricing and inventory changes
Research best practices of catalogues in e-commerce platforms and optimise the guidelines content of the existing catalogue accordingly  
Maintain and distribute periodic reports on the performance of the catalogue, and suggest improvements based on the insightsSkills
Skills:
Strong organisational and administrative skills
Accurate with a strong attention to detail
Curious with an insatiable willingness to learn and improve
Positive attitude and receptive to input and constructive feedback
Good persuasion and negotiation skills
Strong ownership attitude with bias for action
